channel.title: Connecting with hamachi
channel.description:
so im a beginner and my source is icy-scape. i wanna code this server just for a few friends (5 or something) so i wanna use hamachi for it, dont tell me to use no-ip or to portforward somewhere else because this is not my router and hamachi is the only option for me.
i changed the 127.0.... with the ip from my hamachi account,when my friend wants to connect it gives an error (on the picture under this). [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2d12vqp.jpg[/img] anyone know how i can let them connect? :/

item.title: Connecting with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Post the contents of your Batch file here.

If you can fix it yourself here’s what you do:

Add a “-cp .;” before the called file, without the quotes of course.

Read full topic

item.description:
@noty wrote:

go and portforward and stop using the damn hamachi!
